languages.text: "Осмелюсь доложить, что, пока повстанцы из своей проклятой зенитки стреляют, доставить вас к губернатору на шаттле нет никакой возможности. Надо пешком идти, а на улицах опасно".

"If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."
languages.original_text: "Осмелюсь доложить, что, пока повстанцы из своей проклятой зенитки стреляют, доставить вас к губернатору на шаттле нет никакой возможности. Надо пешком идти, а на улицах опасно".

traits.locale_text: "If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am} — as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned cannon, there is absolutely no way to take you to the governor by shuttle. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

"If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am} — as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned cannon, there is absolutely no way to take you to the governor by shuttle. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

"If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned cannon, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

"If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned cannon, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

"If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

"If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned cannon, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

languages.text: "Wenn ich Bericht erstatten darf, {mf|Sir|Madam}, so lange die Rebellen weiter ständig ihre verfluchte Flugabwehrbatterie abfeuern, könnt Ihr unmöglich per Shuttle zum Gouverneur gelangen. Ihr müsstet zu Fuß gehen, und die Straßen sind gefährlich."
languages.original_text: "If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich Bericht erstatten darf, {mf|Sir|Madam}, so lange die Rebellen weiter ständig ihre verfluchte Kanone abfeuern, könnt Ihr unmöglich per Shuttle zum Gouverneur gelangen. Ihr müsstet zu Fuß gehen, und die Straßen sind gefährlich."

languages.text: « Si je peux me permettre, {mf|monsieur|madame}, tant que les rebelles tiendront cette foutue batterie antiaérienne, aucune navette ne vous amènera auprès du gouverneur. Il va falloir y aller à pied, mais les rues sont dangereuses. »
languages.original_text: "If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

traits.locale_text: « Si je peux me permettre, {mf|monsieur|madame}, tant que les rebelles tiendront ce foutu canon, aucune navette ne vous amènera auprès du gouverneur. Il va falloir y aller à pied, mais les rues sont dangereuses. »

languages.text: “请容我报告，长官。只要叛军那门该死的防空炮还没哑火，您恐怕就没办法乘坐穿梭机前往总督那边。您只能步行过去，但街上很危险。”
languages.original_text: "If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

traits.locale_text: “请容我报告，长官。只要叛军那门该死的大炮还没哑火，您恐怕就没办法乘坐穿梭机前往总督那边。您只能步行过去，但街上很危险。”

languages.text: 「ご報告ですが、反乱軍が対空砲を撃ち続ける限り、あなたを総督のもとへお送りすることはできません。移動手段は徒歩のみで、通りは危険です」
languages.original_text: "If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

traits.locale_text: 「ご報告ですが、反乱軍が大砲を撃ち続ける限り、あなたを総督のもとへお送りすることはできません。移動手段は徒歩のみで、通りは危険です」

languages.text: «Si se me permite informar, mientras los rebeldes sigan disparando esa batería antiaérea, no hay absolutamente ninguna forma de llevarle al gobernador. Tendría que ser a pie, y las calles son peligrosas».
languages.original_text: "If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

traits.locale_text: «Si se me permite informar, mientras los rebeldes sigan disparando sus malditos cañones, no hay absolutamente ninguna forma de llevarle al gobernador. Tendría que ser a pie, y las calles son peligrosas».

languages.text: "Bir maruzatım olacak efendim. İsyancılar lanet havasavar bataryalarını ateşlemeye devam ettikleri sürece valiye mekikle ulaşmak mümkün değil. Tek seçenek yayan gitmek ama sokaklar da tehlikeli."
languages.original_text: "If I may report, {mf|sir|ma'am}, as long as the rebels keep shooting their damned anti-aircraft battery, there is absolutely no way to shuttle you to the governor. It would have to be on foot, and the streets are dangerous."

traits.locale_text: "Bir maruzatım olacak efendim. İsyancılar lanet havasavar bataryalarını ateşlemeye devam ettikleri sürece valiye mekikle ulaşmak mümkün değil. Tek seçenek yayan gitmek ama sokaklar da tehlikeli."
